author: Electricks94
body:
This PR defines MultiCollections as `std::vector<RefProd<T>>` for `HGCRecHitCollection` and `PFRecHitCollection`. The MultiCollections are created as product of the `RecHitMapProducer` and comsumed by other producers to create a `MultiSpan` on the fly. This workflow has two advantages

1. Memory copies are avoided
2. The order of the MultiCollections is defined in one location (see [issue 48526](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48526#issuecomment-3449942861) 


FYI @felicepantaleo @leobeltra
title: Define MultiCollections for HGCRecHitCollection and PFRecHitCollection
